title: Odoo - Developer/Programmer
job_overview:
Job Overview:
We are looking for a skilled Odoo.sh Developer to join our team and contribute to the development, customization, and maintenance of our Odoo applications hosted on Odoo.sh. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of the Odoo framework, Odoo.sh platform, and experience in developing business applications.

Key Responsibilities:
Develop and customize Odoo modules (backend and frontend) based on business requirements.
Manage and maintain Odoo.sh environments (development, staging, production).
Integrate third-party APIs and tools with Odoo.
Perform Odoo.sh deployment tasks, including version control with Git.
Troubleshoot and debug issues in Odoo modules and Odoo.sh environments.
Collaborate with functional consultants and other developers to implement features and resolve issues.
Write technical documentation and adhere to development best practices.
Perform unit testing and support UAT (User Acceptance Testing).

Required Skills & Qualifications:
Proven experience with Odoo (v12+) and Odoo.sh platform.
Strong knowledge of Python, PostgreSQL, XML, and JavaScript.
Experience with Git and CI/CD pipelines on Odoo.sh.
Familiarity with Odoo ORM, QWeb templates, and Odoo Studio.
Good understanding of business workflows (Sales, Inventory, Accounting, HR, etc.).
Ability to write clean, modular, and well-documented code.
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

Preferred Qualifications:
Odoo certification(s).
Experience with Odoo multi-company/multi-currency environments.
Experience integrating Odoo with external systems (e.g., payment gateways, CRMs).
Knowledge of Linux server environments and web hosting.
Familiarity with Docker and cloud platforms.

What We Offer:
Competitive salary and benefits.
Flexible working hours and remote work options.
Exposure to international projects.
A collaborative and innovative work environment.
Opportunities for learning and career advancement.
